analyzed: bsam mtha' ni 'khor lo dag gi nang gi lam rnams so //
translated: The end of thought is the inner paths of the wheels.

analyzed: gal te 'dod na de'i tshe spyod pa spyad do //

analyzed: @137b de la chos ni bshad par bya //
